title: The Feeling of The Faces
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Do this here~, this part.... should be like this~.... alright, it’s done! Rina-chan, how about this one? Rina-chan’s board「La~lala~♪」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Waaah,「La~lala~♪」gives out a lively feeling.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe, I’m happy to hear that from a Rina-chan’s board professional such as you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If you don’t mind, I’d like to add it to the Rina-chan’s board repertoire.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yaaay! So you see, this one represents how I felt when my mom told me this morning that “We’re going to have strawberry shortcake for dessert today” just before I left~. You can use it whenever you feel thrilled or can’t wait for something!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Fufu, it’s really cheerful with all the music notes and hearts drawn on it. The one I drew is this. Rina-chan’s board「Delighted」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>The eyes are hearts on this one, how cute~! This gives off the feeling like you’re having a lot of fun. And maybe a little bit excited too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah, it’s how I feel drawing these faces with you, Honoka-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Rina-chan....!! I also love drawing boards and spending time with you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ehehe, I’m glad, but also a little embarrassed. Rina-chan’s board「Blush」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
